DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized study evaluate utility MVCT quality assurance measure patient treat interstitial permanent seed implant low intermediate risk prostate cancer . All patient receive standard care treatment receive additinoal CT image prostate .
DOC.brief_title: Application Megavoltage Imaging Reduce Artifact After Seed Implants
DOC.criteria: Male 5080 year age Eligible interstitial brachytherapy implant
